heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. A combination of ice, wintry mix, and snow spreading east overnight, first reaching southwestern Vermont in the early evening hours, then the New Hampshire border before midnight. Heaviest during the late night hours. Lows from the teens to low 20s.

heading: Monday
text: A combination of ice and a wintry mix in the morning, then transitioning to rain during the mid morning. Anywhere from .1″ to .4″ on ice accumulation possible on untreated surfaces. Widespread showers become more scattered around noon. Warmer. Highs through the mid-30s.

heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Wintry mix and rain turning over to snow showers after sunset. Brief dry periods before sunrise. Lows from the low to upper teens.
